title: Augusta County: Jedediah Hotchkiss to Sara A. Hotchkiss, March 30, 1862
summary: Hotchkiss writes of his appointment as Acting Topographical Engineer on General Jackson's staff, and of the drafting of all the militia units into the regular Confederate army.
keywords: Family, Military Authority, Slavery, African Americans, Enlistment, National Government, Church/Religious Activity, Troop Movement, American Civil War
